alert.note: Alert for South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 02 at 2:34AM MST until February 03 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Widespread Sub-freezing temperatures expected, generally between 28 and 32 degrees. Potentially a bit colder in the normally colder locations, like near larger washes. * WHERE...Tohono O`odham Nation and South Central Pinal County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will damage sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: South Central Pinal County including Eloy, Picacho Peak State Park; Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells
